project_descr: Capacity Building and On-Ground Investments for Sustainable Land Management

outputs.output_descr: Sustainable land management (SLM) of a number of land users who utilize the results of technical and scientific is increased, support for improved land management is provided, land use plans by local stakeholders including local administration accepted and actively supported. Livelihood of land users is improved in the project sites. Land users use their improved capacity for active participation in land use planning. Improved practical and theoretical knowledge concerning management of land resources  leads to a higher and more stable income of farmers and rural population in the project sites.
